amendment.description: Amendment requires the Department of Homeland Security to coordinate its activities regarding protection of critical infrastructure with other relevant Federal agencies.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in part B of House Report 109-84 to require the DHS to coordinate its activities regarding protection of critical infrastructure with "other relevant Federal agencies".

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cox amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A004) offered by Mr. Cox.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Cox amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.
